Action.author: benjamincburns
Action.body: I think the bug is here|https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-seth/blob/master/processor/src/seth_tp/handler/handler.go#L105-L108 . Notice that if an error occurs the handler never issues a transaction receipt. Then at line 114 if there is no error from the TransactionHandler, a receipt is created.

Action.author: benjamincburns
Action.body: PR submitted to address this issue:Â https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-seth/pull/77
